text: English pop rock band The 1975 has released four studio albums, a live album, five extended plays and twelve singles. The band's debut album, The 1975 (2013), debuted at number one on the UK Albums Chart and was certified Platinum by the British Phonographic Industry. Its follow-up, I Like It When You Sleep, for You Are So Beautiful yet So Unaware of It, was released on 26 February 2016. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+List of albums, with selected chart positions !
